snippet.title: Hollowbody - Official Gameplay Video | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Get a closer look at the gameplay of Hollowbody in this latest video for the upcoming tech-noir survival horror game. The video gives us a look at the chilling world set in the urban decay of a long abandoned British city, along with gameplay like environmental exploration, puzzles, and combat. Hollowbody will be available on Steam and GOG in 2024, and a demo is available now on Steam.
